name: Espresso
description: A strong, bold coffee made by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans.

name: Cappuccino
description: A classic Italian coffee drink made with equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and foam.

name: Latte
description: Smooth espresso combined with steamed milk and topped with a light layer of foam.

name: Americano
description: Espresso diluted with hot water for a lighter, smooth coffee flavor.

name: Mocha
description: A chocolate-flavored coffee drink made with espresso, steamed milk, and cocoa.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: Rich and moist chocolate cake topped with creamy chocolate frosting.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Warm chocolate cake with a gooey molten chocolate center.

name: Chocolate Cheesecake
description: Smooth and creamy cheesecake with a chocolate flavor and chocolate crust.
